CHAT.comment: Time is 32:48. Explains the magnet activity and that he will be videotaping their hands

MOT and Chi play well together and talk between the two is more or less balanced. EXP stays in the background , only laughing at certain points during the activity. After looking at the various objects , MOT and Chi proceed to build something on the black base. Next , MOT and Chi become interested in the yellow wand. They notice that coins are not attracted to the magnets , and they find this fact interesting , but no further discussion of the properties of magnets follows. Magnets are set up on a table; Chi and Mot are seated on either side of it; there are several objects stuck to both the yellow wand and the black base

clears objects off yellow wand and black base
